articles.content: The result is replicated in 1080p gaming tests across several e-sports and AAA titles, with the Ryzen 7 6800H's iGPU managing to stay ahead of the pack, followed closely by the Ryzen 5 6600H. One can… [+511 chars]

articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.title: Apple will reportedly debut an M2 chip with four new Macs this year - The Verge
articles.description: Apple is expected to release four new Macs with a new M2 chip, according to Bloomberg reporter Mark Gurman. The chip may be slightly faster than the M1 chip, but will still feature the same eight-core architecture.
articles.content:
Including a MacBook Air and 13-inch MacBook Pro
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
Apple is reportedly gearing up to release several new Macs with an M2 chip later this year, according to Bloo… [+1741 chars]

articles.description: Intel hires AMD lead Radeon Discrete GPU Architect, Rohail Verma, in new acquisition for the company and future in GPU and SoC technology.
